node.title: Man who used cattle prod to inflict 'sadistic' violence against partner jailed
node.alt: A woman's hands holds a phone as seen through leaves on a tree.
node.description: A man who electrocuted his former partner with a cattle prod, threaten her with a gunÂ and forced her to sleep outside has been found guilty of 12 counts of rape and three counts of aggravated assault.
node.content:
["A Northern Territory man found guilty of 12 counts of rape and three\u00a0counts of aggravated assault against his former partner has been sentenced to 15\u00a0years in prison for the offences which took place between 2015 and 2018.\u00a0", "The man, who cannot be named for legal reasons, was sentenced by Acting Justice Dean Mildren at the Alice Springs Supreme Court on November 1.", "\"The words 'domestic violence'\u00a0are inadequate to properly describe the torment that you caused her to suffer,\" Acting Justice Mildren said.", "During sentencing remarks, Acting Justice Mildren characterised the man's behaviour as \"extremely controlling,\" \"callous\" and \"sadistic\".\u00a0", "The court heard during their relationship the victim worked full-time and looked after the finances for his business \u2014\u00a0which ran at a loss \u2014\u00a0while also looking after their two young children.\u00a0", "She was also forced to make sure there was alcohol ready for him when he returned home from work and she had to \"generally act as [his] personal servant\".", "In her victim impact statement, the woman said she was now\u00a0raising their two children alone and\u00a0suffered\u00a0\"constant nightmares\",\u00a0had\u00a0no social life and felt \"worthless\".", "", "
Acting Justice Dean Mildren found\u00a0the man\u00a0showed no remorse for his abuse.(ABC Alice Springs: Mitchell Abram)
", "
Rape as 'punishment'
", "The court heard the pair had been high school sweethearts and the man's behaviour towards his partner \"changed\" following the birth of their first child in 2010.\u00a0", "In one incident, the court heard he pointed a shotgun at her head and body while \"berating her\" for not earning enough money, before raping her as a \"punishment\".\u00a0", "On another occasion, the man kicked and hit the victim, then banged her head\u00a0against a kitchen panel before arming\u00a0himself with a cattle prod and cornering her in their bedroom.\u00a0", "\"You activated it while holding it against her for approximately four to five seconds, applying an electric shock which caused significant pain and two large bruises to her torso,\" Acting Justice Mildren said.", "In another incident, the man used the threat of the cattle prod\u00a0to rape her.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"You told her that she had to ... have sex with you as punishment or she would get shocked by the prod,\" Acting Justice Mildren said.", "The court heard she frequently received abusive text messages and had been forced to sleep outside on at least four occasions.\u00a0", "Once, she spent the night in the car.", "Another time in a sleeping bag on an outside chair.\u00a0", "\"On the fourth occasion when it was at the edge of winter, she slept on cold concrete in just a shirt and shorts, with no phone or wallet and was unable to call for help,\" Acting Justice Mildren said.\u00a0", "The court heard the woman\u00a0did not reported the abuse until October 2018 because she felt \"ashamed\" and \"fearful\".", "
Lied about experience of abuse\u00a0
", "Acting Justice Mildren said the man had shown no remorse for his conduct and had also been found guilty of assaulting their son.\u00a0", "In submissions by his counsel, the man said he had witnessed violence as a child.", "That\u00a0statement was later retracted.\u00a0", "The man has been forbidden to have any contact directly or indirectly with his former partner for 20\u00a0years.\u00a0", "He was sentenced to 15 years' imprisonment with a non-parole period of 12 years, backdated from November 1, 2019."]
